data.name: Beam Splitter
data.detailed_description:
Beam Splitter is an endless arcade style game. In each level, place mirrors and beam splitters to reflect and split a laser beam, hitting each sensor to activate it. But be careful to avoid hitting explosives, which may cost you the game. And ensure you're collecting enough coins in each level to place mirrors in future levels!

Additional Features

  • Relaxing gameplay with no timer
  • Procedurally generated levels for higher replayability
  • Adaptive difficulty so levels get harder the farther you get
  • A lighthearted soundtrack featuring popular Creative Commons artists
